claim: Is A15 Zr3Sb (25 at.% Sb) thermodynamically stable at 1 atm? Report convex hull distance (meV/atom), competing phases, and any T stability window.

error.message: Available local TDBs do not provide the required element set {Zr, Sb, VA}. The present database(s) cannot represent the Zr–Sb binary. Per CALPHAD.md, no external TDBs may be used, so this task cannot be computed here.
